statements: SELECT * FROM currencies
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE currency_code = 'USD'
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE exchange_rate > 1.0 ORDER BY exchange_rate ASC
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies ORDER BY currency_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_currencies FROM currencies
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE currency_code = 'USD';
SELECT * FROM currencies WHERE exchange_rate > 1.0 ORDER BY currency_name DESC;
SELECT currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE exchange_rate BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0 ORDER BY exchange_rate ASC;
SELECT currency_code, currency_name, exchange_rate FROM currencies WHERE currency_name LIKE 'Euro%';
SELECT currency_code, MAX(exchange_rate) AS highest_exchange_rate FROM currencies;
SELECT currency_code, currency_name FROM currencies;
SELECT currency_name, currency_code FROM currencies;
SELECT * FROM exchange_rates WHERE from_currency = 'USD';
SELECT date, rate FROM exchange_rates WHERE to_currency = 'EUR';
SELECT exchange_id, from_currency, to_currency, rate FROM exchange_rates ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT currency_name, currency_code FROM currencies ORDER BY currency_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(rate) AS highest_rate FROM exchange_rates WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
